channel.title: >>>>> CronicPK - New RSC Server - Here To Stay!
channel.description:
[COLOR=Red]Hi guys,
Sick of looking for a new RSC server? Sick of finding a pro RSC server and finding thats its been shut off for months or there website aint working anymore?[/COLOR]
[COLOR=red]Well [/COLOR]Cronicpk's[COLOR=Red] is here, and here to Stay![/COLOR]
[COLOR=red]We are a new server, and would love to have you in our community.[/COLOR]
[COLOR=Cyan]Owner - Cole[/COLOR]
[COLOR=Lime]Below is a few Details about CronicPKs.
We are Running on a Dedi - The Server is online 24/7
Wilderness is P2P&F2P
All Skilling works ( Agility Removed )
Wizard teleporting NPC Gambling NPC PK Area NPC ( Pay to tele, and last person standing gets all the buy in cash )
Black Dragons / Red Dragons / King Black Dragon - All at Alter tele.
Server has no lag at all (h)
Combat with no bugs
All Mage spell's work correctly ( Correct casting timer and range )
Perfect Economy.
a Couple of ingame Screen Shots ( more will be added )[/COLOR]
[IMG]http://i34.tinypic.com/1rd7jb.jpg[/img]
[IMG]http://i36.tinypic.com/35ml5b8.jpg[/img]
[IMG]http://i34.tinypic.com/avpw03.jpg[/img]
[IMG]http://i34.tinypic.com/i35h7q.jpg[/img]
[IMG]http://i35.tinypic.com/5b795y.jpg[/img]
[IMG]http://i37.tinypic.com/4smrdf.jpg[/img]
[IMG]http://i34.tinypic.com/efs0n9.jpg[/img]
[IMG]http://i33.tinypic.com/2w7ll36.jpg[/img]
[COLOR=DarkOrange]Finaly - The Client Download.[/COLOR]
[url=http://uppit.com/v/ZFE1C0LF]http://uppit.com/v/ZFE1C0LF[/url]
[COLOR=YellowGreen]My ingame name is[/COLOR] [COLOR=DarkOrchid]Dip[/COLOR] [COLOR=Magenta]add me and let me know that your new to Cronicpk :)[/COLOR]
